question: My husband and I have been trying to conceive for 6 months now, I am wondering if his medications may be effecting his sperm counts. He is on Gemfibozil 600mg BID, Metformin 500mg daily, and Lisinopril/HCTZ 20/12.5 mg two tabs daily. Any suggestions?
title: Infertile due to BP meds, diabetes meds, and cholerstrol meds?
